full_summary:
### NSN: 01-459-6416, Desiccant, Activated

#### Government Tender Announcement

#### Brief Overview

The Department of National Defence is seeking to procure Desiccant, Activated, as per the following specifications. This tender is open to Canadian suppliers and is subject to certain conditions and preferences.

#### Details of Items

| Item No. | Item Description | Unit of Issue | Quantity | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Desiccant, Activated | LB | 5000 | CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia |
| 2 | Desiccant, Activated | LB | 5000 | CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia |


#### Important Notes

* Bidders proposing an equivalent or a substitute product must provide the brand name and model, or Part Number and NCAGE information.
* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars only; bids in foreign currency will not be considered.
* The requirement does not offer exchange rate fluctuation risk mitigation, and such provisions in bids will render them non-responsive.
* A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

#### Submission Instructions

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French);
* Bidders must submit their bids electronically through the provided link;
* The deadline for submission is July 18, 2024, at 14:00 hours (Eastern Daylight Time).

#### Contact Information

For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact:

* Matthew Johnston
* Email: [matthew.johnston2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.johnston2@forces.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 939-3636
